page.title: 05CUSTOMS 03800597
page.content: Since 1927, the{Upper Redesdale Show } has been held in Rochester.It takes place every September and is run by a local committee. There is a well_entered{Sheepdog trial}and a {Swaledale and Blackface Sheep Competition.The large tent houses the baking exhibits,the industrial section (including classes for home_made wine,metal_work,photography),the horticultural section,children's work and walking sticks.Other attractions include Junior Fell races,children's sports,Punch & Judy Show,clay pigeon shoot,dog scurry,wrestling,stalls and a beer tent.The{annual bus trip}to the seaside in July is well_supported. Other{annual occasions}are Bonfire Night,the Halloween Party and the Christmas Party.{Border Foxhounds}meet each February after the Hunt Ball and on New Year's Day.
